versions.name: Default
versions.description: A theme that aims to replicate the red and black look of Netflix. Theme is by prayag17.

versions.name: Default
versions.description: This theme aims to be minimalistic and somewhat muted in color. Add-ons and custom accent colors are possible, but not entirely supported by this plug-in. Visit the github of the theme for more information.

versions.name: Accent color - blue
versions.description: Uses the default blue color for accents.

versions.name: Accent color - purple
versions.description: Uses a purple shade, also suited for Jellyfin.

versions.name: Accent color - blue - sharp
versions.description: Uses the default blue color for accents. Sharp corners.

versions.name: Accent color - purple - sharp
versions.description: Uses a purple shade, also suited for Jellyfin. Sharp corners.

versions.name: Default
versions.description: This theme aims to be more colorful and minimalistic. Add-ons and custom accent colors are possible, but not entirely supported by this plug-in. Visit the github of the theme for more information.

versions.name: Accent color - blue
versions.description: Uses the default blue color for accents.

versions.name: Accent color - blue - sharp
versions.description: Uses the default blue color for accents. Sharp corners.

versions.name: Default
versions.description: Novachromic is essentially Monochromic, but with another layer of overrides on top.

versions.name: Default
versions.description: A very bright and colorful look using lots of drop shadows. Theme is by prayag17.
